{"id":1195495099,"question_id":2903,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 days, 7 hours","timestamp":1709710815,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"38 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1195495099/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Insert Greatest Common Divisors in Linked List","memory":"34.2 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * struct ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode *next;\n *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}\n *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    ListNode* insertGreatestCommonDivisors(ListNode* head) {\n        ListNode* ans = head, *cur = head;\n        while(cur->next){\n            ListNode *tmp = cur->next;\n            ListNode *gcdNode = new ListNode(__gcd(cur->val, tmp->val));\n            //cout << cur->val << ' ' << tmp->val << ' ' << __gcd(cur->val, tmp->val);\n            cur->next = gcdNode, gcdNode->next = tmp;\n            cur = tmp, tmp = tmp->next;\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"insert-greatest-common-divisors-in-linked-list","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
